The present study aim 1 ) translate culturally validate Finnish version Visual Analogue Scale Foot Ankle Lower Extremity Functional Scale , 2 ) study psychometric property two questionnaire
DOC.brief_title: Reliability Validity Finnish Visual Analogue Scale Foot Ankle Lower Extremity Functional Scale
DOC.detailed_description: This study assess reliability validity Finnish version Visual Analogue Scale Foot Ankle Lower Extremity Functional Scale . The English version translate trans-culturally adapted Finnish language accord well accept international translation guideline . The psychometric property assess internal validity , intraclass correlation coefficient test-retest reliability .
DOC.criteria: Pathology foot ankle Surgery due foot ankle problem Other foot ankle surgery age 18 year
